publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3193 Marilyn Livingstone: Drug and Alcohol Project (Levenmouth)â€”That the Parliament congratulates the staff and volunteers of the Drug and Alcohol Project (Levenmouth) which started as a small community project over 10 years ago and has developed into an organisation providing lifeline services to the local community; welcomes the expansion of the project to communities within Kirkcaldy, and recognises the service as an example of best practice.Supported by: Christine May*, Tricia Marwick*, Sarah Boyack*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Jackie Baillie*, Helen Eadie*
S2M-3193 Drug and Alcohol Project (Levenmouth) (lodged on 29 August 2005) Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Bill Butler*, Bruce Crawford*, Trish Godman*
S2M-3193 Drug and Alcohol Project (Levenmouth) (lodged on 29 August 2005) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-3193 Drug and Alcohol Project (Levenmouth) (lodged on 29 August 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S2M-3193 Drug and Alcohol Project (Levenmouth) (lodged on 29 August 2005) Donald Gorrie*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-3193 Drug and Alcohol Project (Levenmouth) (lodged on 29 August 2005) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-3193 Drug and Alcohol Project (Levenmouth) (lodged on 29 August 2005) Mr Mark Ruskell*
